description: An artist is depicted painting a knight in full armor standing in a child's red wagon, holding a sword. This portrayal is a deeply absurd and ironic interpretation of the epic tale of St. George and the Dragon. The humor stems from the mundane and childish setting (the red wagon) juxtaposed with the expectation of a heroic scene (a knight battling a dragon). The inquiry from the figure behind the artist highlights the discrepancy between the requested subject and the bizarre reality being painted.
caption: “So, Andre! ... The king wants to know how you’re coming with St. George and the Dragon.”
